call(List<Double>) - Method in class neural_network.functions.TransferFunction
Implementation of the transfer function, which returns a sum of w_ij * o_j where w_ij are weights and o_j are values of Neurons in the left Layer.

J

javaNeuralNetwork.main - module javaNeuralNetwork.main
Welcome to the javaNeuralNetwork module! This module contains the neural_network package, which is used for training, validating and testing a neural network for n-dimensional datapoints.

LeakyReLU - Class in neural_network.functions
Class to represent a leaky ReLU function (can be just a ReLU if the leak is set to 0.0), which is an Activator for Neurons.

No-args constructor method - leak defaults to zero.
